articles.title: Samsung Exynos 1280 SoC officially announced - India Today
articles.description: Samsung Exynos 1280 SoC is based on a 5nm EUV process. The chipset is already available in the Samsung Galaxy A53 5G, Galaxy M33 5G and the Galaxy A33 5G.
